author: breitbart.com
title: GOP Sen Cornyn: Border Wall Ratings 'Very Low' Among Texans - Breitbart
text:
GOP Sen Cornyn: Border Wall Ratings ‘Very Low’ Among Texans by Trent Baker 12 Feb 2017 0
12 Feb, 2017 12 Feb, 2017 SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER
During Sunday’s “The Cats Roundtable” on New York AM 970 radio, Sen. John Cornyn (R-TX) weighed in on President Donald Trump’s proposed border wall with Mexico, saying it would rate “very low” among Texans.
SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER
“I think people would say if you were talking about a physical wall, it would rate very low,” Cornyn told host JohnCatsimatidis. “[M]ost people in Texas understand that our 1200-mile border is not the same at every point along the way.”
Cornyn then offered up a better approach to secure the border.
“I agree with Secretary of Homeland Security Gen. John Kelly who says a layered approach makes sense, basically fencing, technology and boots on the ground.”
Follow Trent Baker on Twitter @MagnifiTrent
